DOC.brief_summary: The objective study evaluate efficacy safety single oral dose two dose combination naproxen sodium diphenhydramine ( DPH ) demonstrate naproxen sodium/DPH combination provide added clinical benefit sleep improvement either single ingredient alone subject post-surgical dental pain phase advance sleep .
DOC.brief_title: Evaluate Analgesic/Sedative Efficacy Naproxen Sodium Diphenhydramine Patients With Postsurgical Dental Pain
DOC.criteria: Healthy , ambulatory , male female volunteer age 12 old Scheduled undergo surgical removal minimum two third molar least one mandibular third molar . The mandibular extraction ( ) require subject must meet one follow scenario : one full bony impaction two partial bony impaction one full bony impaction one partial bony impaction one full bony impaction one soft tissue impaction one full bony impaction one erupt third molar . Two full bony mandibular impaction allow . Maxillary third molar may remove regardless impaction level . Have moderate severe postoperative pain Categorical Pain Rating Scale score â‰¥ 50 mm 100mm visual analog Pain Severity Rating Scale 1600 hour 1830 hour day surgery Female subject childbearing potential must use medically acceptable form birth control least 1 month prior screen ( 3 month oral contraceptive ) , e.g. , oral patch contraceptive , intrauterine device , DepoProvera , doublebarrier negative pregnancy test Screening prior surgery . Female subject nonchildbearing potential must amenorrheic least 2 year hysterectomy and/or bilateral oophorectomy Provide personally sign date informed consent indicate subject inform pertinent aspect trial , ( subject < 18 year age must sign write assent parental guardian consent ) . History hypersensitivity naproxen , diphenhydramine , nonsteroidal antiinflammatory drug ( NSAIDS ) , tramadol , aspirin antihistamine similar pharmacological agent component product Evidence history clinically significant ( judgment investigator ) hematological , renal , endocrine , pulmonary , gastrointestinal , cardiovascular , hepatic , psychiatric , neurologic disease , malignancy within last 5 year Relevant concomitant disease asthma ( exercise induce asthma permit ) , chronic sinusitis nasal structural abnormality cause great 50 percent obstruction ( polyposis nasi , mark septal deviation ) interfere conduct study judgment investigator Current past history bleeding disorder ( ) Acute illness local infection prior surgery interfere conduct study judgment investigator Chronic use antihistamine define use 5 time week 2 consecutive week past 3 month Positive alcohol breathalyzer test positive urine drug test prior surgery Females pregnant lactate Chronic severe sleep problem respond / Over Counter ( OTC ) medication require prescription hypnotic sedative Habitually spend less 6.5 hour bed
